cyclone.name: LIDIA
cyclone.current_location: about 250 mi WSW of Manzanillo, Mexico
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest to north-northwest toward the southern Baja California peninsula
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: southern tip of Baja California Sur, near Cabo San Lucas

weather_observation.watch_coast: Hurricane Watch from Puerto Cortes to Los Barriles and Tropical Storm Watch north of Los Barriles to San Evaristo (Baja California Sur)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Todos Santos to Los Barriles (Baja California Sur)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: southwestern mainland Mexico (Michoacan to Nayarit) and Baja California Sur coastline
weather_observation.expected_closest_date_to_port: Not expected to approach within 100 nm of Port of Los Angeles during 5-day forecast
weather_observation.wind: Breezy conditions possible late in the period; tropical-storm-force winds unlikely (â‰¤4% chance).
weather_observation.rainfall: Minimal; only light, intermittent showers possible.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Long-period swells and enhanced rip currents may reach Southern California beaches toward the weekend, which could disrupt small-boat operations but should not significantly affect cargo handling within the port.
